channel.title: Noobscape or EasyRsc link
channel.description:
When I run my noobscape server using the Run Server.bat it reads buildfile.xml runserver Java.lang.exceptioninInitializerError at org.rscdaemon.server.io.worldloader.loadsection<worldloader.java:113> followed by a host of other things like that.
The program must end because it says Build Successful (which I wasn't trying to compile) "press any key to continue" (end of process) Hence my server does not initialize, I cannot figure out why.
Otherwise if anyone has a upto date link for a download for Easyrsc, please let me know

item.title: Noobscape or EasyRsc link
item.dc:creator: @nrg1 nrg1
item.description:
@nrg1 wrote:

When I run my noobscape server using the Run Server.bat
it reads
buildfile.xml
runserver
Java.lang.exceptioninInitializerError
at org.rscdaemon.server.io.worldloader.loadsectionworldloader.java:113
followed by a host of other things like that.

The program must end because it says Build Successful (which I wasn’t trying to compile)
“press any key to continue” (end of process) Hence my server does not initialize, I cannot figure out why.

Otherwise if anyone has a upto date link for a download for Easyrsc, please let me know
